news.title: Madlib and Your Old Droog Tap Killer Mike for New Song “The Edge”: Watch the Video
news.summary: The track will reportedly appear on a forthcoming project from Madlib and Your Old Droog’s Droogie Otis

news.title: Taylor Swift Announces New Album The Life of a Showgirl
news.summary: A release date has yet to be shared for Swift’s 12th studio album and follow-up to The Tortured Poets Department

news.title: Kaytranada Shares Song From Very Imminent New Album: Listen
news.summary: “Space Invader” is the first taste of Ain’t No Damn Way!, the new album that the producer is dropping on Friday, August 15
